mapper.select:
select u.user_id userId , u.user_name userName, u.user_login_id userLoginId, u.user_org_id userOrgId, u.user_parent_id userParentId, u.`status` `status`, u.user_email userEmail, u.tel_phone telPhone, u.address address, org.org_name orgName, group_concat(r.role_name) roleName from usercontroller_user u LEFT JOIN usercontroller_org org on u.user_org_id=org.org_id LEFT JOIN usercontroller_user_role ur on ur.user_id=u.user_id left JOIN usercontroller_role r on ur.role_id=r.role_id where (u.user_id=#{userID} or u.user_parent_id=#{userID})
and u.status = '1'
GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY u.`STATUS` desc,u.user_id asc
